Product Name: Amazon Brand - Symbol Men's Solid Cotton Formal Shirt | Plain | Full Sleeve - Regular Fit (Available in Plus Size)
Review Text: I recently purchased the Arrow Black shirt
Reviewer Name: and unfortunately
column5: I was quite disappointed with the overall quality and fit of the product.

Product Name: Firstly
Rating: the material used for the shirt felt cheap and low-quality. It was not as soft or comfortable as I expected
Review Text: and it seemed to wrinkle easily even after minimal wear. The fabric also felt thin and did not hold up well after washing
Reviewer Name: which was a major letdown.

Product Name: The fit of the shirt was also problematic. Despite ordering my usual size
Rating: the shirt was either too tight in some areas or too loose in others
Review Text: resulting in an awkward and unflattering look. The sizing seemed inconsistent
Reviewer Name: making it difficult to find a comfortable and well-fitting option.

Product Name: Moreover
Rating: the stitching and finishing of the shirt were not up to par. There were loose threads and uneven seams
Review Text: which gave the impression of poor craftsmanship. The buttons also felt flimsy and prone to coming loose with regular wear.

Product Name: In terms of style
Rating: the Arrow Black shirt was quite basic and lacked any unique or standout features. It did not live up to the expectations I had based on the product description and images online.

Product Name: Overall
Rating: I cannot recommend the Arrow Black shirt due to its disappointing quality
Reviewer Name: and lackluster design. I would suggest looking for better alternatives with higher-quality materials and better attention to detail in terms of construction and fit.

I had no time to keep this game continue. So kept the shirt (Quality and Part white Colour of my choice and Black Colour Buttons of sellers choice).
My Suggestion to Amazon : Kindly put a option of "Remarks" on site while placing the order.

I had no time to keep this game continue. So kept the shirt (Quality and Part white Colour of my choice and Black Colour Buttons of sellers choice).
My Suggestion to Amazon : Kindly put a option of "Remarks" on site while placing the order.
